title: Where did the old tin sign that read \Get right with God\" go when Hwy 140 was built? It was on Castle Hayne Road near GE as you headed to Wilmington."
text:
Here's a link to an answer to your question.



Sorry, we don't know where the cross is, but we will keep trying to
find out.   



Ben Steelman

(910) 343-2208
